The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 02 October is 398,728 (708.4 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 28 September, there were 33,210 new confirmed cases (59.0 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 21 September, there were 28,058 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 18% (5152 extra cases).
